mapper.select: select tgr.idn_user_group as key, tgr.short_name as value from tpa_tuser_group tgr where tgr.idn_user_group_type = (select idn_user_group_type from tpa_tuser_group_type where type_code = 'SHIPPER') order by upper(tgr.user_group_id) asc

SELECT tsp.idn_system_point AS key, tsp.point_code AS VALUE FROM tpa_tsystem_point tsp, tpa_tarea a, tpa_tzone z WHERE tsp.idn_system_point_group = (SELECT tsg.idn_system_point_group FROM tpa_tsystem_point_group tsg WHERE tsg.group_code = 'CONTRACT') AND tsp.idn_area = a.idn_area AND a.idn_zone = z.idn_zone AND z.idn_pipeline_system = #{idnSystem} ORDER BY upper(tsp.point_code) ASC
